item.title: Blog Setup
item.description: I love setting up something new as I really appreciate the opportunity to ‘nerd out’ and try out new stuff and learn. I have previousely dabbled with different types of static site generators, Jekyll, Octopress, Bashblog and Chisel to name a few. But this time I wanted to try out Hugo. Hugo Hugo was super easy to install with apt on Linux Mint and brew on macOS taking care of any potential dependencies (apt install hugo and brew install hugo respectively).
